facultyName: Department of Politics and International Studies
description: The MSc International Politicsexplores key issues and debates in world politics from a variety of perspectives. We cover important questions such as: Why do wars happen? Is global peace possible? How is power exercised in international politics? What are the conditions for cooperation among states? How does migration challenge and change the international political order?
duration: 1 year full time, 2-3 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
